rooms.description: Entry area with a foyer and storage space, designed to welcome guests in line with Vastu principles, ensuring the entrance faces north or east.
Open space with Mediterranean style furnishings and ample floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Positioned towards south-east to capture sunlight throughout the day.
Adjacent open dining area integrated with the living room, offering a seamless transition between spaces.
Fully equipped kitchen with Mediterranean design elements and efficient layout to support both functionality and aesthetics. Includes a pantry area.
Spacious bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light; placed in the north-west zone following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Grand entry with a glass panel, providing clear visibility of the entrance area while ensuring security.
Floor-to-ceiling window designed to maximize natural light and panoramic views.
Large window complementing the dining area with Mediterranean aesthetics.
